## Description {#details}

Represents overflowing binary operations.

Only carry-out: G&#95;UADDO, G&#95;SADDO, G&#95;USUBO, G&#95;SSUBO, G&#95;UMULO, G&#95;SMULO Carry-in and carry-out: G&#95;UADDE, G&#95;SADDE, G&#95;USUBE, G&#95;SSUBE

Definition at line 394 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/genericmachineinstrs-h">GenericMachineInstrs.h</a>.
